statements: SELECT * FROM cultural_trends
SELECT trend_name, trend_description FROM cultural_trends
SELECT trend_name, trend_start_date, trend_end_date FROM cultural_trends
SELECT * FROM cultural_trends WHERE trend_start_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT trend_name, trend_description FROM cultural_trends ORDER BY trend_end_date DESC
SELECT trend_id, trend_name, trend_description FROM cultural_trends WHERE trend_start_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT trend_name, trend_start_date, trend_end_date FROM cultural_trends WHERE trend_end_date > '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM cultural_trends WHERE trend_description LIKE '%innovation%';
SELECT trend_name, trend_start_date, trend_end_date FROM cultural_trends ORDER BY trend_start_date DESC;
SELECT trend_name, trend_description FROM cultural_trends WHERE trend_name LIKE 'T%' ORDER BY trend_end_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM cultural_trends;
SELECT trend_name, start_date, end_date FROM cultural_trends WHERE influence_description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT influence_name, category, description FROM cultural_influences ORDER BY influence_name ASC;
SELECT trend_name, start_date, end_date, influence_name, category FROM cultural_trends JOIN cultural_influences ON cultural_trends.trend_id = cultural_influences.trend_id;
SELECT * FROM cultural_trends WHERE end_date > '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM cultural_trends WHERE trend_name='Fashion'
SELECT influence_name, category FROM cultural_influences WHERE influence_id > 5 ORDER BY influence_name DESC
SELECT trend_name, start_date, end_date FROM cultural_trends WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31'
SELECT ct.trend_name, ci.influence_name, ci.category FROM cultural_trends ct JOIN cultural_influences ci ON ct.trend_id = ci.trend_id WHERE ct.start_date < '2023-01-01'
SELECT ct.trend_name, ci.influence_name, ci.category FROM cultural_trends ct LEFT JOIN cultural_influences ci ON ct.trend_id = ci.trend_id WHERE ci.category = 'Technology'
SELECT * FROM cultural_trends;
SELECT trend_name, trend_year FROM cultural_trends WHERE trend_year > 2010;
SELECT trend_name, trend_description FROM cultural_trends WHERE trend_description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM trend_influences WHERE influence_type = 'social';
SELECT trend_name, data_year, data_value FROM cultural_trends JOIN trend_data ON cultural_trends.trend_id = trend_data.trend_id;
SELECT * FROM cultural_trends;
SELECT trend_name, trend_year FROM cultural_trends WHERE trend_year > 2010;
SELECT trend_name, trend_description FROM cultural_trends WHERE trend_description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT t.trend_name, ti.influence_name FROM cultural_trends t INNER JOIN trend_influences ti ON t.trend_id = ti.trend_id;
SELECT t.trend_name, td.data_value FROM cultural_trends t JOIN trend_data td ON t.trend_id = td.trend_id WHERE td.data_year = 2020 ORDER BY td.data_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM cultural_trends;
SELECT trend_name, trend_description FROM cultural_trends WHERE trend_id = 1;
SELECT trend_name, trend_description FROM cultural_trends WHERE trend_influence_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT data_date, data_value FROM trend_data WHERE data_value > 100;
SELECT user_name, comment_text, comment_date FROM user_comments ORDER BY comment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM cultural_trends ORDER BY trend_id DESC;
SELECT trend_name, trend_description FROM cultural_trends WHERE trend_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT trend_name, data_date, data_value FROM cultural_trends INNER JOIN trend_data ON cultural_trends.trend_id = trend_data.trend_id WHERE data_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT influence_category, COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM trend_influences GROUP BY influence_category ORDER BY total_count DESC;
SELECT trend_name, user_name, comment_text FROM cultural_trends INNER JOIN user_comments ON cultural_trends.trend_id = user_comments.trend_id WHERE user_name LIKE 'John%' ORDER BY comment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM cultural_trends;
SELECT influencer_name, country FROM influencers WHERE profession = 'Fashion';
SELECT trend_name, start_year, end_year FROM cultural_trends WHERE start_year > 2010;
SELECT t.trend_name, COUNT(tr.influencer_id) AS influencer_count FROM trend_relation tr INNER JOIN cultural_trends t ON tr.trend_id = t.trend_id GROUP BY t.trend_name;
SELECT category_name, COUNT(trend_id) AS trend_count FROM trend_category_relation tr INNER JOIN trend_category c ON tr.category_id = c.category_id GROUP BY category_name ORDER BY trend_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM influencers WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT trend_name, start_year, end_year FROM cultural_trends ORDER BY start_year DESC;
SELECT influencer_name, profession FROM influencers WHERE profession = 'YouTuber' AND birth_year > 1990;
SELECT t1.trend_name, t2.category_name FROM cultural_trends t1 JOIN trend_category_relation tcr ON t1.trend_id = tcr.trend_id JOIN trend_category t2 ON tcr.category_id = t2.category_id;
SELECT trend_name, description FROM cultural_trends WHERE description IS NOT NULL ORDER BY trend_name ASC;
